text: Kaya te ase mhanatata ki te tara tyane svatah banavile ahe. (Tumhi) sanga ki jara mica te banavuna anale ahe tara tumhi majhyasathi allahatarphe konatyahi gostica adhikara balagata nahi. Tumhi ya kura'anavisayi je kahi sangata aikata ahata, te allaha cangalya prakare janato. Majhya ani tumacya daramyana saksa denyasa toca puresa ahe ani to motha mapha karanara, motha dayavana ahe
